header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Death, cancer, health (mental and physical), family, children.
header.activity: Friends talking about family members and health issues.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, Inquiring, Advising, anecdote telling

speaker.fls: French -- working knowledge; German -- Working knowledge
